output.input_text:
PET-CT Whole BodyFollow-up of known breast cancerFindings:
Primary Site: No residual hypermetabolic lesion in the left breast or axilla.
Lymph Nodes: Mildly hypermetabolic left supraclavicular lymph node (SUV max 4.5), suspicious for metastatic involvement.
Distant Metastasis: No hypermetabolic lesions detected in the lungs, liver, or bones.
Background Activity: Physiological tracer uptake in other organs.

Impression:
No evidence of residual disease in the left breast.
Suspicious left supraclavicular lymph node. Consider biopsy.
No evidence of distant metastases.
